mrcleaner.title: Mr. Cleaner
mrcleaner.description: Cleans directory and sub-directory everything except a file extension.

args.name: num_workers
args.description: The number of worker threads to use (default: 1).

gh_repo_downloader.title: GitHub Repository Downloader
gh_repo_downloader.description: Clone GitHub repositories based on criteria.

args.name: --output-dir
args.description: The directory to save the cloned repositories.

args.name: --stars
args.description: The minimum number of stars for repositories to clone.

args.name: --size-limit
args.description: The maximum size limit in MB for repositories to clone.

args.name: --code-type
args.description: The code type to search for on GitHub.

args.name: --age
args.description: The age of repositories to search for in years (default: 5).

args.name: --csv-file
args.description: The name of the CSV file to log the cloned repositories (default: repositories.csv).

args.name: --by-user
args.description: The username of the repository owner.

args.name: --by-organization
args.description: The organization name to search for repositories.

args.name: --code-percentage
args.description: The percentage of code in a repository to search for.

args.name: --repo-name
args.description: The repository name to search for.
